original_text: The Lord said, ‘Jeremiah, someone may ask you a question. He may be one of these people or a prophet or a priest. He may ask you, “What message of trouble is the Lord telling us now?” Then you must say to him, “You are the trouble! The Lord says that he will go away from you.” The Lord said, ‘Jeremiah, someone may ask you a question. He may be one of these people or a prophet or a priest. He may ask you, “What message of trouble is the Lord telling us now?” Then you must say to him, “You are the trouble! The Lord says that he will go away from you.”
korean_text: 이 백성이나 선지자나 제사장이 네게 물어 이르기를 여호와의 엄중한 말씀이 무엇인가 묻거든 너는 그들에게 대답하기를 엄중한 말씀이 무엇이냐 묻느냐 여호와의 말씀에 내가 너희를 버리리라 하셨고

sentences.original_text: The Lord said
'Jeremiah, someone may ask you a question.
He may be one of these people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이 사람들 중 하나일 수 있다

sentences.original_text: or a prophet or a priest.
He may ask you
'What message of trouble
is the Lord telling us now?'
Then you must say to him
'You are the trouble!
The Lord says
that he will go away from you.'
